title: City of Port Hueneme City Council Member Text Messages/Electronic Communications During Council Meetings

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Time frame: January 1, 2025 – July 18, 2025
Records requested: All text messages, emails, and social media messages sent or received by any member of the Port Hueneme City Council during all official City Council meetings within the above timeframe, across any devices (personal or municipal), that relate to the conduct of public business.
Under City of San Jose v. Superior Court (2 Cal. 5th 608, 629 (2017)), communications—whether by text, email, or social media—are public records if they concern the conduct of public business, regardless of the device or account used. 
Additionally, the California Supreme Court has held that messages sent on personal devices by public officials, even during official meetings, are subject to public disclosure. 
Please provide the records in electronic format, with timestamps, sender, recipient, and message content.
If any portion is withheld, please cite the specific statutory exemption and describe the nature of withheld content.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Juiciest

title: Georgia Open Records Request – Bodycam & Records for Arrest of Patrick Mattews (Jan 9, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I respectfully request access to records related to the arrest of Patrick Edwin Mattews (also known as Patrick Matthews), booked under #2024-01-0155 by the Lowndes County Sheriff’s Office on January 9, 2024.

The arrest involved a vehicle pursuit exceeding 100 mph on North Valdosta Road and Shiloh Road, and an attempted theft at Griffin Chrysler Dealership.

I request the following records:

Body-worn camera footage from responding officers and dash cam footage from any involved patrol vehicles

Arrest reports, narrative supplements, and the incident report

Booking photos or mugshots

Evidence photographs or video, particularly of recovered tools or the attempted theft scene

Please notify me of any fees in advance and provide the responsive records in electronic format if possible.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: SOR and Community Supervision
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

The exact number of people who are 

1) on both the sex offender registry and probation; and
2) on both the sex offender registry and parole;

as per the latest available data is requested.

If this cannot be provided, I request records that include:

The list of people on probation
The list of people on parole
The list of people on the sex offender registry

as per the latest available data. 

If this data is held by another agency, I request the name of that agency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Wendy Sawyer

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: EOCO Reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

1. Any/all EOCO complaints filed and ensuing investigatory paperwork from July 1, 2024 - June 30, 2025 for the following schools:

a. Holden Elementary
b. Wildwood Elementary
c. Pulaski Elementary
d. Payton High School
e. Marshall High School

The July 1, 2024 date is meant to be the starting point for reviewing complaints not meant for complaints in progress on July 1, 2024. 

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
